text:
Inside a <jar> task, when another jar is specified with a <zipfileset
src=myjar.jar/> tag and is missing, ant just prompts the <jar> tag line number
and says "the archive doesn't exist".

It would help the developer if ant could give the name of the missing archive.
creator: philippe.haution@mines-paris.org
peterreilly@apache.org
text:
Should be in ant 1.7.1,
thanks for the report.

creator: philippe.haution@mines-paris.org
text:
Ant 1.7.1 was finally released by I don't see this enhancement inside the WHATSNEW file.
Did you simply forget to add it into this list of changes ?

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
we don't always keep WHATSNEW in sync with changes, I've more than once committed minor changes (and from a code-change point of view this is minor) without updating WHATSNEW because I felt it wasn't worth to be mentioned.

The relevant change is http://svn.eu.apache.org/viewvc/ant/core/branches/ANT_17_BRANCH/src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/types/ArchiveFileSet.java?r1=513823&r2=529630&pathrev=554389
